title: Prefix unknown keywords with x-
description: Any keyword not defined in the active dialect must be vendor-prefixed (e.g. `x-foo`). This avoids accidental clashes with future spec keywords.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Unknown keyword without prefix
comprehensiveExamples.description: Custom keywords must be vendor-prefixed (e.g., x-foo).

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Prefixed custom keyword
comprehensiveExamples.description: Using an x- prefix avoids conflicts with future spec keywords.
